analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/21/0x0714cfc984b873c9e3e126333da529095e244e7c.sol:
	Contract DRONECOIN has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/21/0x0714cfc984b873c9e3e126333da529095e244e7c.sol#215)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/21/0x0714cfc984b873c9e3e126333da529095e244e7c.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/21/0x0714cfc984b873c9e3e126333da529095e244e7c.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/21/0x0714cfc984b873c9e3e126333da529095e244e7c.sol#85) is not in mixedCase
